snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan went to Janesville, Wis., over the weekend to be with family and friends as he decides whether to try to become the next speaker of the House.
abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan retreats to his Wisconsin hometown of Janesville to contemplate whether to accept calls to be next House speaker; residents respect need for privacy and express ambivalence about decision, even as economically flagging town covets attention and investment Ryan's ascension could provide.
lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan went to Janesville, Wis., over the weekend to be with family and friends as he decides whether to try to become the next speaker of the House.

headline.main: Hometown Lets Paul Ryan Ponder Speaker Job on Own Terms
headline.print_headline: Hometown Lets Ryan Ponder Speaker Job on Own Terms
